relativename  Unnamed Brother relation  Cousin relativename  Unnamed Cousin appearance   series speaking    The Sixth Grader Leader previously the thgrade leader is the leader of the  Although he is the most prominently featured Sixth Grader his name has yet to be revealed   He and his friends can be seen at  at the  forcing  to eat the hot tamales when they are about to hit  Cartman scares them by farting fire  He made his first appearance in series on the episode  where he participates in Cartmans party  He had his first speaking role in the episode  where he and his friends scare the boys with ghost legends making them want to take revenge At the end of the episode he and his friends are frightened by s corpse  His second speaking role was in the episode  where he gathers an entire group of sixthgrade students to steal a porn movie that the boys were carrying  His third and final speaking role was in  where he and the other th Graders promise to defend the boys from being attacked by  if they bring a photo of s breasts After the boys brought the picture to them which was actually a picture of Cartmans ass they try to fight Trent but end up failing resulting in several burns and wounds At the hospital he tells the boys he had told Trent that they asked for their help  Despite becoming a background character in the current seasons he still makes some notable appearances as in the episode  where he participates in Stans video   He is first seen at the beginning of the game talking to other th graders after the conversation he will do a weird dance while teasing the other th graders he will keep doing it until the player befriends  and   He is no longer seen until  where he appears as one of several enemies representatives that  faced throughout the game that they want to take revenge during the battle he reveals that he has a cousin and a  also reveals that he also has a brother  He later appears when the New Kid goes to the  where it is revealed that  was turning th graders into mutants The th Grader Leader can be seen on the first floor as an ape mutant trapped on a table the player will then have the option to pay  cents for the machine to put extra butts on him if the player does too much the machine will only hit him  It is not known whether he returned to his normal form and how he left Dr Mephestos laboratory   He is a tall th grader with messy brown hair with large sideburns pointed black eyebrows and a broad slightly bulbous nose He is best known for having a photo of his own face in his green shortsleeved shirt He also wears blue jeans and black shoes and has a red bicycle In  his appearance was slightly redesigned but he still looks the same in later episodes Moreover he has the stereotypical characteristics of Asians seen in the series such as small eyes In his old appearance he wore a similar outfit except that his shirt was lighter and his pants were brown He made an appearance with these clothes in    His main interests include doing sweet wheelies on his bike picking on younger students and acquiring pictures of breasts and other pornographic material He appears to never have actually seen a real pair of breasts since he appears unable to discern the difference between s ass and a pair of breasts in     He apparently finds Mrs Marsh attractive as in  he promised that his gang would defend the boys from  in exchange for a picture of her breasts   He often assumes the position of leadership within the Sixth Grade It is assumed he has a high status within the Sixth Grade social hierarchy He appears to have a low opinion of Fourth Graders whom he greatly enjoys tormenting    and   The th Grader Leader is widely seen with these two unnamed th graders especially in previous seasons They were most often seen tormenting The Boys together     Seen with  in the school playground   Appears in a cameo role at s clubhouse party   Seen buying tickets to a movie in  it is revealed that he has a brother and a cousin His facial features bear a notable resemblance to the shows portrayal of many Asian characters This could be a possible indicator of his ethnicity
